column6:
It's part 3 of "Blood and Sand," with the heart of the American dream at stake.,2007,6
Somewhere in the heart of the Sonoran desert, halfway between the United States and Mexico, the Hate-Monger and his infamous
hostage go one-on-one. Meanwhile, G.W. Bridge goes rogue... Stuart Clarke investigates how the National Force gets its
information and who's helping them get it... and Frank Castle unveils his astonishing plan.
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | writer:Matt Fraction | penciller (cover):Ariel Olivetti
